TEXT.English: We are the [OUR_CIV_ADJ]; we honor all those who follow their own destiny rather than the dictates of divine manipulators.
TEXT.French: We are the [OUR_CIV_ADJ]; we honor all those who follow their own destiny rather than the dictates of divine manipulators.
TEXT.German: We are the [OUR_CIV_ADJ]; we honor all those who follow their own destiny rather than the dictates of divine manipulators.
TEXT.Italian: We are the [OUR_CIV_ADJ]; we honor all those who follow their own destiny rather than the dictates of divine manipulators.
TEXT.Spanish: We are the [OUR_CIV_ADJ]; we honor all those who follow their own destiny rather than the dictates of divine manipulators.

TEXT.English: Menec welcomes you, [CT_NAME]. Your presence here is most welcome.
TEXT.French: Menec welcomes you, [CT_NAME]. Your presence here is most welcome.
TEXT.German: Menec welcomes you, [CT_NAME]. Your presence here is most welcome.
TEXT.Italian: Menec welcomes you, [CT_NAME]. Your presence here is most welcome.
TEXT.Spanish: Menec welcomes you, [CT_NAME]. Your presence here is most welcome.

TEXT.English: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I am Menec, who speaks for Cassiel and his people.
TEXT.French: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I am Menec, who speaks for Cassiel and his people.
TEXT.German: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I am Menec, who speaks for Cassiel and his people.
TEXT.Italian: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I am Menec, who speaks for Cassiel and his people.
TEXT.Spanish: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I am Menec, who speaks for Cassiel and his people.

TEXT.English: Ahh, if it is not the first amongst Erebus' villainy. What ill wind blows you here, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.French: Ahh, if it is not the first amongst Erebus' villainy. What ill wind blows you here, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.German: Ahh, if it is not the first amongst Erebus' villainy. What ill wind blows you here, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Italian: Ahh, if it is not the first amongst Erebus' villainy. What ill wind blows you here, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Spanish: Ahh, if it is not the first amongst Erebus' villainy. What ill wind blows you here, [CT_NAME]?

TEXT.English: Most gracious; on the behalf of my people, I accept.
TEXT.French: Most gracious; on the behalf of my people, I accept.
TEXT.German: Most gracious; on the behalf of my people, I accept.
TEXT.Italian: Most gracious; on the behalf of my people, I accept.
TEXT.Spanish: Most gracious; on the behalf of my people, I accept.

TEXT.English: Sounds like a fair deal.
TEXT.French: Sounds like a fair deal.
TEXT.German: Sounds like a fair deal.
TEXT.Italian: Sounds like a fair deal.
TEXT.Spanish: Sounds like a fair deal.

TEXT.English: Reluctantly I accept. I loathe to give one such as you even the smallest victory.
TEXT.French: Reluctantly I accept. I loathe to give one such as you even the smallest victory.
TEXT.German: Reluctantly I accept. I loathe to give one such as you even the smallest victory.
TEXT.Italian: Reluctantly I accept. I loathe to give one such as you even the smallest victory.
TEXT.Spanish: Reluctantly I accept. I loathe to give one such as you even the smallest victory.

TEXT.English: I must graciously refuse.
TEXT.French: I must graciously refuse.
TEXT.German: I must graciously refuse.
TEXT.Italian: I must graciously refuse.
TEXT.Spanish: I must graciously refuse.

TEXT.English: This Deal isn't good enough for my people.
TEXT.French: This Deal isn't good enough for my people.
TEXT.German: This Deal isn't good enough for my people.
TEXT.Italian: This Deal isn't good enough for my people.
TEXT.Spanish: This Deal isn't good enough for my people.

TEXT.English: The power I am vested with is not to be trifled with. Your deal is rejected and your lack of respect noted. Have you anything else to discuss?
TEXT.French: The power I am vested with is not to be trifled with. Your deal is rejected and your lack of respect noted. Have you anything else to discuss?
TEXT.German: The power I am vested with is not to be trifled with. Your deal is rejected and your lack of respect noted. Have you anything else to discuss?
TEXT.Italian: The power I am vested with is not to be trifled with. Your deal is rejected and your lack of respect noted. Have you anything else to discuss?
TEXT.Spanish: The power I am vested with is not to be trifled with. Your deal is rejected and your lack of respect noted. Have you anything else to discuss?

TEXT.English: Will this deal will resolve to our mutual satisfaction?
TEXT.French: Will this deal will resolve to our mutual satisfaction?
TEXT.German: Will this deal will resolve to our mutual satisfaction?
TEXT.Italian: Will this deal will resolve to our mutual satisfaction?
TEXT.Spanish: Will this deal will resolve to our mutual satisfaction?

TEXT.English: All of you catspaws and lickspittle boys of the divine manipulators must be taught to serve mankind. You can start by serving us in this small way, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.French: All of you catspaws and lickspittle boys of the divine manipulators must be taught to serve mankind. You can start by serving us in this small way, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.German: All of you catspaws and lickspittle boys of the divine manipulators must be taught to serve mankind. You can start by serving us in this small way, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Italian: All of you catspaws and lickspittle boys of the divine manipulators must be taught to serve mankind. You can start by serving us in this small way, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Spanish: All of you catspaws and lickspittle boys of the divine manipulators must be taught to serve mankind. You can start by serving us in this small way, [CT_NAME].

TEXT.English: I have great hopes that you and your people will come to appreciate the benefits of civilization unburdened with the fever swamps of fanatism, [CT_NAME]. Share with me your clarity of thought and put my mind at rest.
TEXT.French: I have great hopes that you and your people will come to appreciate the benefits of civilization unburdened with the fever swamps of fanatism, [CT_NAME]. Share with me your clarity of thought and put my mind at rest.
TEXT.German: I have great hopes that you and your people will come to appreciate the benefits of civilization unburdened with the fever swamps of fanatism, [CT_NAME]. Share with me your clarity of thought and put my mind at rest.
TEXT.Italian: I have great hopes that you and your people will come to appreciate the benefits of civilization unburdened with the fever swamps of fanatism, [CT_NAME]. Share with me your clarity of thought and put my mind at rest.
TEXT.Spanish: I have great hopes that you and your people will come to appreciate the benefits of civilization unburdened with the fever swamps of fanatism, [CT_NAME]. Share with me your clarity of thought and put my mind at rest.

TEXT.English: Our mutual love of excellence makes us kindred of a sort, [CT_NAME]. Would you help your brothers in need?
TEXT.French: Our mutual love of excellence makes us kindred of a sort, [CT_NAME]. Would you help your brothers in need?
TEXT.German: Our mutual love of excellence makes us kindred of a sort, [CT_NAME]. Would you help your brothers in need?
TEXT.Italian: Our mutual love of excellence makes us kindred of a sort, [CT_NAME]. Would you help your brothers in need?
TEXT.Spanish: Our mutual love of excellence makes us kindred of a sort, [CT_NAME]. Would you help your brothers in need?

TEXT.English: Most suitable.
TEXT.French: Most suitable.
TEXT.German: Most suitable.
TEXT.Italian: Most suitable.
TEXT.Spanish: Most suitable.

TEXT.English: I do not think you would benefit from our attention at the moment; I know we would not benefit from wasting time with you.
TEXT.French: I do not think you would benefit from our attention at the moment; I know we would not benefit from wasting time with you.
TEXT.German: I do not think you would benefit from our attention at the moment; I know we would not benefit from wasting time with you.
TEXT.Italian: I do not think you would benefit from our attention at the moment; I know we would not benefit from wasting time with you.
TEXT.Spanish: I do not think you would benefit from our attention at the moment; I know we would not benefit from wasting time with you.

TEXT.English: The time has come for us to mount a crusade of our own. Not a crusade for any so-called true faith but a war against the unworthy, superstitious illiterates of the world.
TEXT.French: The time has come for us to mount a crusade of our own. Not a crusade for any so-called true faith but a war against the unworthy, superstitious illiterates of the world.
TEXT.German: The time has come for us to mount a crusade of our own. Not a crusade for any so-called true faith but a war against the unworthy, superstitious illiterates of the world.
TEXT.Italian: The time has come for us to mount a crusade of our own. Not a crusade for any so-called true faith but a war against the unworthy, superstitious illiterates of the world.
TEXT.Spanish: The time has come for us to mount a crusade of our own. Not a crusade for any so-called true faith but a war against the unworthy, superstitious illiterates of the world.

TEXT.English: Offer Peace: Your people are resilient and perhaps not without promise. Agree to a period of peace and perhaps we can find another way to reach you.
TEXT.French: Offer Peace: Your people are resilient and perhaps not without promise. Agree to a period of peace and perhaps we can find another way to reach you.
TEXT.German: Offer Peace: Your people are resilient and perhaps not without promise. Agree to a period of peace and perhaps we can find another way to reach you.
TEXT.Italian: Offer Peace: Your people are resilient and perhaps not without promise. Agree to a period of peace and perhaps we can find another way to reach you.
TEXT.Spanish: Offer Peace: Your people are resilient and perhaps not without promise. Agree to a period of peace and perhaps we can find another way to reach you.

TEXT.English: Good. Perhaps a worldly salvation yet awaits your people. Perhaps.
TEXT.French: Good. Perhaps a worldly salvation yet awaits your people. Perhaps.
TEXT.German: Good. Perhaps a worldly salvation yet awaits your people. Perhaps.
TEXT.Italian: Good. Perhaps a worldly salvation yet awaits your people. Perhaps.
TEXT.Spanish: Good. Perhaps a worldly salvation yet awaits your people. Perhaps.

TEXT.English: What? Do you fear a meeting with your maker? You should; the callous puppeteer has no mercy for a broken toy.
TEXT.French: What? Do you fear a meeting with your maker? You should; the callous puppeteer has no mercy for a broken toy.
TEXT.German: What? Do you fear a meeting with your maker? You should; the callous puppeteer has no mercy for a broken toy.
TEXT.Italian: What? Do you fear a meeting with your maker? You should; the callous puppeteer has no mercy for a broken toy.
TEXT.Spanish: What? Do you fear a meeting with your maker? You should; the callous puppeteer has no mercy for a broken toy.

TEXT.English: I do not think Cassiel's vision is best served by remaining your vassal, [CT_NAME], nor do I regard my own destiny being one of service.
TEXT.French: I do not think Cassiel's vision is best served by remaining your vassal, [CT_NAME], nor do I regard my own destiny being one of service.
TEXT.German: I do not think Cassiel's vision is best served by remaining your vassal, [CT_NAME], nor do I regard my own destiny being one of service.
TEXT.Italian: I do not think Cassiel's vision is best served by remaining your vassal, [CT_NAME], nor do I regard my own destiny being one of service.
TEXT.Spanish: I do not think Cassiel's vision is best served by remaining your vassal, [CT_NAME], nor do I regard my own destiny being one of service.

TEXT.English: The clock of armageddon strikes eleven, [CT_NAME], and I fear the dictates of our secular philosophy must take second priority to survival. Stand with us and we will be your most loyal friend.
TEXT.French: The clock of armageddon strikes eleven, [CT_NAME], and I fear the dictates of our secular philosophy must take second priority to survival. Stand with us and we will be your most loyal friend.
TEXT.German: The clock of armageddon strikes eleven, [CT_NAME], and I fear the dictates of our secular philosophy must take second priority to survival. Stand with us and we will be your most loyal friend.
TEXT.Italian: The clock of armageddon strikes eleven, [CT_NAME], and I fear the dictates of our secular philosophy must take second priority to survival. Stand with us and we will be your most loyal friend.
TEXT.Spanish: The clock of armageddon strikes eleven, [CT_NAME], and I fear the dictates of our secular philosophy must take second priority to survival. Stand with us and we will be your most loyal friend.

TEXT.English: Ask to join a war: Even now I am poised to strike down the %s1. Join us and we will put an end to their false hopes.
TEXT.French: Ask to join a war: Even now I am poised to strike down the %s1. Join us and we will put an end to their false hopes.
TEXT.German: Ask to join a war: Even now I am poised to strike down the %s1. Join us and we will put an end to their false hopes.
TEXT.Italian: Ask to join a war: Even now I am poised to strike down the %s1. Join us and we will put an end to their false hopes.
TEXT.Spanish: Ask to join a war: Even now I am poised to strike down the %s1. Join us and we will put an end to their false hopes.

TEXT.English: Refuse to join a war: Perhaps our foes are not the only ones indulging in sophistry.
TEXT.French: Refuse to join a war: Perhaps our foes are not the only ones indulging in sophistry.
TEXT.German: Refuse to join a war: Perhaps our foes are not the only ones indulging in sophistry.
TEXT.Italian: Refuse to join a war: Perhaps our foes are not the only ones indulging in sophistry.
TEXT.Spanish: Refuse to join a war: Perhaps our foes are not the only ones indulging in sophistry.

TEXT.English: Your encroachments and insults end here. From this day forward, we are enemies.
TEXT.French: Your encroachments and insults end here. From this day forward, we are enemies.
TEXT.German: Your encroachments and insults end here. From this day forward, we are enemies.
TEXT.Italian: Your encroachments and insults end here. From this day forward, we are enemies.
TEXT.Spanish: Your encroachments and insults end here. From this day forward, we are enemies.

TEXT.English: We are a great people. We do not need to bend our knees to you.
TEXT.French: We are a great people. We do not need to bend our knees to you.
TEXT.German: We are a great people. We do not need to bend our knees to you.
TEXT.Italian: We are a great people. We do not need to bend our knees to you.
TEXT.Spanish: We are a great people. We do not need to bend our knees to you.

TEXT.English: Let us rest in your shade and drink from your wells - the firstfruits of our flocks and fields will be yours, if you will only protect us.
TEXT.French: Let us rest in your shade and drink from your wells - the firstfruits of our flocks and fields will be yours, if you will only protect us.
TEXT.German: Let us rest in your shade and drink from your wells - the firstfruits of our flocks and fields will be yours, if you will only protect us.
TEXT.Italian: Let us rest in your shade and drink from your wells - the firstfruits of our flocks and fields will be yours, if you will only protect us.
TEXT.Spanish: Let us rest in your shade and drink from your wells - the firstfruits of our flocks and fields will be yours, if you will only protect us.

TEXT.English: May the light of life shine upon you. The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] greet you and offer you peace, if you seek it.
TEXT.French: May the light of life shine upon you. The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] greet you and offer you peace, if you seek it.
TEXT.German: May the light of life shine upon you. The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] greet you and offer you peace, if you seek it.
TEXT.Italian: May the light of life shine upon you. The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] greet you and offer you peace, if you seek it.
TEXT.Spanish: May the light of life shine upon you. The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] greet you and offer you peace, if you seek it.

TEXT.English: I have nothing to say to you. Prey upon your own people, for a change.
TEXT.French: I have nothing to say to you. Prey upon your own people, for a change.
TEXT.German: I have nothing to say to you. Prey upon your own people, for a change.
TEXT.Italian: I have nothing to say to you. Prey upon your own people, for a change.
TEXT.Spanish: I have nothing to say to you. Prey upon your own people, for a change.

TEXT.English: Yes, that is best. May both our peoples prosper!
TEXT.French: Yes, that is best. May both our peoples prosper!
TEXT.German: Yes, that is best. May both our peoples prosper!
TEXT.Italian: Yes, that is best. May both our peoples prosper!
TEXT.Spanish: Yes, that is best. May both our peoples prosper!

TEXT.English: So be it. You will find us more than a match for your depredations.
TEXT.French: So be it. You will find us more than a match for your depredations.
TEXT.German: So be it. You will find us more than a match for your depredations.
TEXT.Italian: So be it. You will find us more than a match for your depredations.
TEXT.Spanish: So be it. You will find us more than a match for your depredations.

TEXT.English: Welcome, friend of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ]. Share our bounties, both of field and of spirit!
TEXT.French: Welcome, friend of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ]. Share our bounties, both of field and of spirit!
TEXT.German: Welcome, friend of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ]. Share our bounties, both of field and of spirit!
TEXT.Italian: Welcome, friend of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ]. Share our bounties, both of field and of spirit!
TEXT.Spanish: Welcome, friend of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ]. Share our bounties, both of field and of spirit!

TEXT.English: I greet you. My people grow strong in body and spirit - how do yours fare?
TEXT.French: I greet you. My people grow strong in body and spirit - how do yours fare?
TEXT.German: I greet you. My people grow strong in body and spirit - how do yours fare?
TEXT.Italian: I greet you. My people grow strong in body and spirit - how do yours fare?
TEXT.Spanish: I greet you. My people grow strong in body and spirit - how do yours fare?

TEXT.English: You. What do you want with us? You will find no easy plunder here.
TEXT.French: You. What do you want with us? You will find no easy plunder here.
TEXT.German: You. What do you want with us? You will find no easy plunder here.
TEXT.Italian: You. What do you want with us? You will find no easy plunder here.
TEXT.Spanish: You. What do you want with us? You will find no easy plunder here.

TEXT.English: Yes. Your wisdom does credit to both you and your people.
TEXT.French: Yes. Your wisdom does credit to both you and your people.
TEXT.German: Yes. Your wisdom does credit to both you and your people.
TEXT.Italian: Yes. Your wisdom does credit to both you and your people.
TEXT.Spanish: Yes. Your wisdom does credit to both you and your people.

TEXT.English: You have forced us to submit to your will. No doubt that pleases one so vile as you.
TEXT.French: You have forced us to submit to your will. No doubt that pleases one so vile as you.
TEXT.German: You have forced us to submit to your will. No doubt that pleases one so vile as you.
TEXT.Italian: You have forced us to submit to your will. No doubt that pleases one so vile as you.
TEXT.Spanish: You have forced us to submit to your will. No doubt that pleases one so vile as you.

TEXT.English: That will not benefit my people now. Perhaps another time.
TEXT.French: That will not benefit my people now. Perhaps another time.
TEXT.German: That will not benefit my people now. Perhaps another time.
TEXT.Italian: That will not benefit my people now. Perhaps another time.
TEXT.Spanish: That will not benefit my people now. Perhaps another time.

TEXT.English: Do you take us for fools, [CT_NAME]? Begone, and take your offer with you.
TEXT.French: Do you take us for fools, [CT_NAME]? Begone, and take your offer with you.
TEXT.German: Do you take us for fools, [CT_NAME]? Begone, and take your offer with you.
TEXT.Italian: Do you take us for fools, [CT_NAME]? Begone, and take your offer with you.
TEXT.Spanish: Do you take us for fools, [CT_NAME]? Begone, and take your offer with you.

TEXT.English: You are welcome to our bounty. Take it with our goodwill.
TEXT.French: You are welcome to our bounty. Take it with our goodwill.
TEXT.German: You are welcome to our bounty. Take it with our goodwill.
TEXT.Italian: You are welcome to our bounty. Take it with our goodwill.
TEXT.Spanish: You are welcome to our bounty. Take it with our goodwill.

TEXT.English: Our reputation for hospitality is not an empty one, as you see. Enjoy our gifts.
TEXT.French: Our reputation for hospitality is not an empty one, as you see. Enjoy our gifts.
TEXT.German: Our reputation for hospitality is not an empty one, as you see. Enjoy our gifts.
TEXT.Italian: Our reputation for hospitality is not an empty one, as you see. Enjoy our gifts.
TEXT.Spanish: Our reputation for hospitality is not an empty one, as you see. Enjoy our gifts.

TEXT.English: Take it, and go.
TEXT.French: Take it, and go.
TEXT.German: Take it, and go.
TEXT.Italian: Take it, and go.
TEXT.Spanish: Take it, and go.

TEXT.English: Think of the honor of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ], my friend. Think of the reputation of your people. Should you not return favor with favor?
TEXT.French: Think of the honor of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ], my friend. Think of the reputation of your people. Should you not return favor with favor?
TEXT.German: Think of the honor of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ], my friend. Think of the reputation of your people. Should you not return favor with favor?
TEXT.Italian: Think of the honor of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ], my friend. Think of the reputation of your people. Should you not return favor with favor?
TEXT.Spanish: Think of the honor of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ], my friend. Think of the reputation of your people. Should you not return favor with favor?

TEXT.English: We have labored diligently for that - we cannot give it up so easily.
TEXT.French: We have labored diligently for that - we cannot give it up so easily.
TEXT.German: We have labored diligently for that - we cannot give it up so easily.
TEXT.Italian: We have labored diligently for that - we cannot give it up so easily.
TEXT.Spanish: We have labored diligently for that - we cannot give it up so easily.

TEXT.English: Is that all? I'm surprised that you do not demand half of our women for your harem and half of our children as your slaves, and me to serve as your washing woman. Now go!
TEXT.French: Is that all? I'm surprised that you do not demand half of our women for your harem and half of our children as your slaves, and me to serve as your washing woman. Now go!
TEXT.German: Is that all? I'm surprised that you do not demand half of our women for your harem and half of our children as your slaves, and me to serve as your washing woman. Now go!
TEXT.Italian: Is that all? I'm surprised that you do not demand half of our women for your harem and half of our children as your slaves, and me to serve as your washing woman. Now go!
TEXT.Spanish: Is that all? I'm surprised that you do not demand half of our women for your harem and half of our children as your slaves, and me to serve as your washing woman. Now go!

TEXT.English: This could make both our peoples prosper.
TEXT.French: This could make both our peoples prosper.
TEXT.German: This could make both our peoples prosper.
TEXT.Italian: This could make both our peoples prosper.
TEXT.Spanish: This could make both our peoples prosper.

TEXT.English: That will not benefit my people now. Perhaps another time.
TEXT.French: That will not benefit my people now. Perhaps another time.
TEXT.German: That will not benefit my people now. Perhaps another time.
TEXT.Italian: That will not benefit my people now. Perhaps another time.
TEXT.Spanish: That will not benefit my people now. Perhaps another time.

TEXT.English: Do you take us for fools, [CT_NAME]? Begone, and take your offer with you.
TEXT.French: Do you take us for fools, [CT_NAME]? Begone, and take your offer with you.
TEXT.German: Do you take us for fools, [CT_NAME]? Begone, and take your offer with you.
TEXT.Italian: Do you take us for fools, [CT_NAME]? Begone, and take your offer with you.
TEXT.Spanish: Do you take us for fools, [CT_NAME]? Begone, and take your offer with you.

TEXT.English: Both our peoples are wounded in body and soul. They need healing, not more violence. Should we not have peace?
TEXT.French: Both our peoples are wounded in body and soul. They need healing, not more violence. Should we not have peace?
TEXT.German: Both our peoples are wounded in body and soul. They need healing, not more violence. Should we not have peace?
TEXT.Italian: Both our peoples are wounded in body and soul. They need healing, not more violence. Should we not have peace?
TEXT.Spanish: Both our peoples are wounded in body and soul. They need healing, not more violence. Should we not have peace?

TEXT.English: May the blessings of my people make you prosper.
TEXT.French: May the blessings of my people make you prosper.
TEXT.German: May the blessings of my people make you prosper.
TEXT.Italian: May the blessings of my people make you prosper.
TEXT.Spanish: May the blessings of my people make you prosper.

TEXT.English: Consider what the Malakim have done for you, [CT_NAME]. We ask for this in return.
TEXT.French: Consider what the Malakim have done for you, [CT_NAME]. We ask for this in return.
TEXT.German: Consider what the Malakim have done for you, [CT_NAME]. We ask for this in return.
TEXT.Italian: Consider what the Malakim have done for you, [CT_NAME]. We ask for this in return.
TEXT.Spanish: Consider what the Malakim have done for you, [CT_NAME]. We ask for this in return.

TEXT.English: My people and yours are like brothers, and it is good for brothers to offer their wealth to one another. Do you not agree?
TEXT.French: My people and yours are like brothers, and it is good for brothers to offer their wealth to one another. Do you not agree?
TEXT.German: My people and yours are like brothers, and it is good for brothers to offer their wealth to one another. Do you not agree?

TEXT.Spanish: My people and yours are like brothers, and it is good for brothers to offer their wealth to one another. Do you not agree?

TEXT.English: For many years we have been a shining example equity and justice to the lesser peoples of the world. Now it is appropriate that you offer us something in return.
TEXT.French: For many years we have been a shining example equity and justice to the lesser peoples of the world. Now it is appropriate that you offer us something in return.
TEXT.German: For many years we have been a shining example equity and justice to the lesser peoples of the world. Now it is appropriate that you offer us something in return.
TEXT.Italian: For many years we have been a shining example equity and justice to the lesser peoples of the world. Now it is appropriate that you offer us something in return.
TEXT.Spanish: For many years we have been a shining example equity and justice to the lesser peoples of the world. Now it is appropriate that you offer us something in return.

TEXT.English: We utterly reject your demands. The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] are not your servants, strong though you may be.
TEXT.French: We utterly reject your demands. The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] are not your servants, strong though you may be.
TEXT.German: We utterly reject your demands. The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] are not your servants, strong though you may be.
TEXT.Italian: We utterly reject your demands. The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] are not your servants, strong though you may be.
TEXT.Spanish: We utterly reject your demands. The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] are not your servants, strong though you may be.

TEXT.English: You mistake us for one of your weaker neighbors, [CT_NAME]. My people are not to be thus bullied.
TEXT.French: You mistake us for one of your weaker neighbors, [CT_NAME]. My people are not to be thus bullied.
TEXT.German: You mistake us for one of your weaker neighbors, [CT_NAME]. My people are not to be thus bullied.
TEXT.Italian: You mistake us for one of your weaker neighbors, [CT_NAME]. My people are not to be thus bullied.
TEXT.Spanish: You mistake us for one of your weaker neighbors, [CT_NAME]. My people are not to be thus bullied.

TEXT.English: You would do better to return to your hovels and make those demands of your slaves. Do not darken our halls with such words again.
TEXT.French: You would do better to return to your hovels and make those demands of your slaves. Do not darken our halls with such words again.
TEXT.German: You would do better to return to your hovels and make those demands of your slaves. Do not darken our halls with such words again.

TEXT.Spanish: You would do better to return to your hovels and make those demands of your slaves. Do not darken our halls with such words again.

TEXT.English: Come, [CT_NAME] - the %s1 are a sickness spreading across the face of Erebus, as you well know. Join us in cleansing them, and in leaving the land whole again.
TEXT.French: Come, [CT_NAME] - the %s1 are a sickness spreading across the face of Erebus, as you well know. Join us in cleansing them, and in leaving the land whole again.
TEXT.German: Come, [CT_NAME] - the %s1 are a sickness spreading across the face of Erebus, as you well know. Join us in cleansing them, and in leaving the land whole again.
TEXT.Italian: Come, [CT_NAME] - the %s1 are a sickness spreading across the face of Erebus, as you well know. Join us in cleansing them, and in leaving the land whole again.
TEXT.Spanish: Come, [CT_NAME] - the %s1 are a sickness spreading across the face of Erebus, as you well know. Join us in cleansing them, and in leaving the land whole again.

TEXT.English: You surprise me. Do not mistake this situation, [CT_NAME]. The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] will prevail.
TEXT.French: You surprise me. Do not mistake this situation, [CT_NAME]. The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] will prevail.
TEXT.German: You surprise me. Do not mistake this situation, [CT_NAME]. The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] will prevail.
TEXT.Italian: You surprise me. Do not mistake this situation, [CT_NAME]. The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] will prevail.
TEXT.Spanish: You surprise me. Do not mistake this situation, [CT_NAME]. The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] will prevail.

TEXT.English: At last, we can cast aside this charade of civility. We will devour you and your people like the frightened cattle you are. Our hunt begins!
TEXT.French: At last, we can cast aside this charade of civility. We will devour you and your people like the frightened cattle you are. Our hunt begins!
TEXT.German: At last, we can cast aside this charade of civility. We will devour you and your people like the frightened cattle you are. Our hunt begins!
TEXT.Italian: At last, we can cast aside this charade of civility. We will devour you and your people like the frightened cattle you are. Our hunt begins!
TEXT.Spanish: At last, we can cast aside this charade of civility. We will devour you and your people like the frightened cattle you are. Our hunt begins!

TEXT.English: Lead us? The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] serve no fat city-dwelling masters. Begone, before we set the wolfpacks on you.
TEXT.French: Lead us? The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] serve no fat city-dwelling masters. Begone, before we set the wolfpacks on you.
TEXT.German: Lead us? The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] serve no fat city-dwelling masters. Begone, before we set the wolfpacks on you.
TEXT.Italian: Lead us? The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] serve no fat city-dwelling masters. Begone, before we set the wolfpacks on you.
TEXT.Spanish: Lead us? The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] serve no fat city-dwelling masters. Begone, before we set the wolfpacks on you.

TEXT.English: You and your people are strong - stronger than we. Shield us with your strength, and we will be weapons in your hand and wolves to bring down your prey!
TEXT.French: You and your people are strong - stronger than we. Shield us with your strength, and we will be weapons in your hand and wolves to bring down your prey!
TEXT.German: You and your people are strong - stronger than we. Shield us with your strength, and we will be weapons in your hand and wolves to bring down your prey!
TEXT.Italian: You and your people are strong - stronger than we. Shield us with your strength, and we will be weapons in your hand and wolves to bring down your prey!
TEXT.Spanish: You and your people are strong - stronger than we. Shield us with your strength, and we will be weapons in your hand and wolves to bring down your prey!

TEXT.English: Ah, the civilized people of Erebus. So soft and exposed - so defenseless. ... You look uncomfortable. Did I say something wrong?
TEXT.French: Ah, the civilized people of Erebus. So soft and exposed - so defenseless. ... You look uncomfortable. Did I say something wrong?
TEXT.German: Ah, the civilized people of Erebus. So soft and exposed - so defenseless. ... You look uncomfortable. Did I say something wrong?
TEXT.Italian: Ah, the civilized people of Erebus. So soft and exposed - so defenseless. ... You look uncomfortable. Did I say something wrong?
TEXT.Spanish: Ah, the civilized people of Erebus. So soft and exposed - so defenseless. ... You look uncomfortable. Did I say something wrong?

TEXT.English: Feel free to keep sending me diplomatic envoys. My wolves are always hungry for more.
TEXT.French: Feel free to keep sending me diplomatic envoys. My wolves are always hungry for more.
TEXT.German: Feel free to keep sending me diplomatic envoys. My wolves are always hungry for more.
TEXT.Italian: Feel free to keep sending me diplomatic envoys. My wolves are always hungry for more.
TEXT.Spanish: Feel free to keep sending me diplomatic envoys. My wolves are always hungry for more.

TEXT.English: The peace will last until our prey grows scarce.
TEXT.French: The peace will last until our prey grows scarce.
TEXT.German: The peace will last until our prey grows scarce.
TEXT.Italian: The peace will last until our prey grows scarce.
TEXT.Spanish: The peace will last until our prey grows scarce.

TEXT.English: You speak proudly now, but soon you will wail like a frightened little calf, begging for mercy when we have you halfway down our throats!
TEXT.French: You speak proudly now, but soon you will wail like a frightened little calf, begging for mercy when we have you halfway down our throats!
TEXT.German: You speak proudly now, but soon you will wail like a frightened little calf, begging for mercy when we have you halfway down our throats!

TEXT.Spanish: You speak proudly now, but soon you will wail like a frightened little calf, begging for mercy when we have you halfway down our throats!

TEXT.English: Welcome! Don't worry, the wolves won't bite if you don't get too close. What do you need from the masters of Erebus?
TEXT.French: Welcome! Don't worry, the wolves won't bite if you don't get too close. What do you need from the masters of Erebus?
TEXT.German: Welcome! Don't worry, the wolves won't bite if you don't get too close. What do you need from the masters of Erebus?

TEXT.Spanish: Welcome! Don't worry, the wolves won't bite if you don't get too close. What do you need from the masters of Erebus?

TEXT.English: My men and my wolves grow stronger every day. I'm sure you're glad to hear that.
TEXT.French: My men and my wolves grow stronger every day. I'm sure you're glad to hear that.
TEXT.German: My men and my wolves grow stronger every day. I'm sure you're glad to hear that.
TEXT.Italian: My men and my wolves grow stronger every day. I'm sure you're glad to hear that.
TEXT.Spanish: My men and my wolves grow stronger every day. I'm sure you're glad to hear that.

TEXT.English: Be quick - unless you were planning on staying as dinner.
TEXT.French: Be quick - unless you were planning on staying as dinner.
TEXT.German: Be quick - unless you were planning on staying as dinner.
TEXT.Italian: Be quick - unless you were planning on staying as dinner.
TEXT.Spanish: Be quick - unless you were planning on staying as dinner.

TEXT.German: Yes, this will make us stronger. What else is there in life?
TEXT.Italian: Yes, this will make us stronger. What else is there in life?
TEXT.Spanish: Yes, this will make us stronger. What else is there in life?

TEXT.English: Gloat while you can. But one day you will turn your back on us, and then--!

TEXT.Italian: Gloat while you can. But one day you will turn your back on us, and then--!
TEXT.Spanish: Gloat while you can. But one day you will turn your back on us, and then--!

TEXT.English: Perhaps that would be a good idea if we were flabby townsfolk like you. But we're not.

TEXT.German: Perhaps that would be a good idea if we were flabby townsfolk like you. But we're not.

TEXT.Italian: Go ahead, take it. It'll put hair on your chest!
TEXT.Spanish: Go ahead, take it. It'll put hair on your chest!

TEXT.Italian: Fine, fine. Now go away before we get hungry.
TEXT.Spanish: Fine, fine. Now go away before we get hungry.

TEXT.Spanish: One day, when I'm standing over your broken body, I'll remind you that you demanded this.

TEXT.Italian: Get it yourself. It will make you stronger - and you could certainly stand to be stronger.

TEXT.Italian: No. With the wolves, you have to fight for what you get.

TEXT.German: Thanks, and good hunting.

TEXT.Spanish: Thanks, and good hunting.

TEXT.English: You seem fond of your cities. Try to imagine what they would look like if my wolves ran free in their streets. If you don't like that idea, then I suggest you give us what we ask for.
TEXT.French: You seem fond of your cities. Try to imagine what they would look like if my wolves ran free in their streets. If you don't like that idea, then I suggest you give us what we ask for.

TEXT.English: You've gotten so used to your cities and your civilized society that you've started to forget about the wilderness. If you don't give us what we ask for, you'll find out that the wilderness hasn't forgotten you.

TEXT.English: You must really be interested in starting a war. Fortunately, so are we. Get used to the sound of howling wolves - pretty soon you'll be hearing it a lot.
TEXT.French: You must really be interested in starting a war. Fortunately, so are we. Get used to the sound of howling wolves - pretty soon you'll be hearing it a lot.

TEXT.English: Your first mistake was saying that to the [OUR_CIV_AJD]. Your second mistake was doing it when you have such a pathetic collection of weaklings calling you their leader. The wild never tolerates more than one mistake.
TEXT.French: Your first mistake was saying that to the [OUR_CIV_AJD]. Your second mistake was doing it when you have such a pathetic collection of weaklings calling you their leader. The wild never tolerates more than one mistake.

TEXT.English: Sometimes, the dog you kick turns out to be a wolf. And nobody kicks wolves and gets away with it. Get out of my halls.
TEXT.French: Sometimes, the dog you kick turns out to be a wolf. And nobody kicks wolves and gets away with it. Get out of my halls.
TEXT.German: Sometimes, the dog you kick turns out to be a wolf. And nobody kicks wolves and gets away with it. Get out of my halls.

TEXT.Spanish: Sometimes, the dog you kick turns out to be a wolf. And nobody kicks wolves and gets away with it. Get out of my halls.

TEXT.English: The %s1 are weakened, and will make easy prey! Join us in glutting yourself on their cities and lands!
TEXT.French: The %s1 are weakened, and will make easy prey! Join us in glutting yourself on their cities and lands!
TEXT.German: The %s1 are weakened, and will make easy prey! Join us in glutting yourself on their cities and lands!

TEXT.Spanish: The %s1 are weakened, and will make easy prey! Join us in glutting yourself on their cities and lands!

TEXT.English: Hah! I didn't realize you were such a weakling. We'll remember that.

TEXT.German: You threaten the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] and all Erebus. You must be destroyed.
TEXT.Italian: You threaten the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] and all Erebus. You must be destroyed.
TEXT.Spanish: You threaten the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] and all Erebus. You must be destroyed.

TEXT.English: We are not weaklings, to be shepherded about by you.
TEXT.French: We are not weaklings, to be shepherded about by you.
TEXT.German: We are not weaklings, to be shepherded about by you.
TEXT.Italian: We are not weaklings, to be shepherded about by you.
TEXT.Spanish: We are not weaklings, to be shepherded about by you.

TEXT.English: I fear that we have faltered in our struggle against evil. You, [CT_NAME], and your people offer us the guiding light we need. Please, take us in; shepherd us, and we will be your sheep.
TEXT.French: I fear that we have faltered in our struggle against evil. You, [CT_NAME], and your people offer us the guiding light we need. Please, take us in; shepherd us, and we will be your sheep.

TEXT.English: Greetings, [CT_NAME]. We [OUR_CIV_ADJ] are a strong people seeking the freedom to do good without fear. Join us, so that together we may make Erebus a better place.
TEXT.French: Greetings, [CT_NAME]. We [OUR_CIV_ADJ] are a strong people seeking the freedom to do good without fear. Join us, so that together we may make Erebus a better place.

TEXT.German: Ah, [CT_NAME]. We can always make time for you. What do you need?
TEXT.Italian: Ah, [CT_NAME]. We can always make time for you. What do you need?
TEXT.Spanish: Ah, [CT_NAME]. We can always make time for you. What do you need?

TEXT.English: Well, well. The dark powers never rest, and so neither do we; as a result, my time is limited. State your errand.

TEXT.English: So - is it because you fear my skill on the battlefield that you come to press your unjust demands at the bargaining table instead?

TEXT.Italian: A deal? There are no strings, save those that we attach willingly.

TEXT.Italian: Perhaps we are all voices in the Clown Prince's mind? If so, we should work together.
TEXT.Spanish: Perhaps we are all voices in the Clown Prince's mind? If so, we should work together.

TEXT.English: For perhaps no discernable reason we are set upon the %s1. Reject fate and throw caution to the wind, [CT_NAME]. Join our revelry.

TEXT.English: You think you know what you are doing. That is your weakness.
